game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you are tasked with exploring the forgotten ruins in search of a lost artifact. Be prepared for challenges along the way.
game.reward: 100 experience points and a magical pendant

task.objective: Enter the ruins and locate the entrance to the artifact chamber.
task.description: You'll find the ruins on the east side of the forest. Look for a large stone door covered in藤蔓.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian and retrieve the artifact.
task.description: In the chamber, a powerful ancient guardian protects the artifact. You must defeat it to claim the artifact.
